sqlMap.select: select * from viewgettestsuites where test_suite_name='$testSuiteName$' AND test_reference='$testReference$' order by id desc LIMIT 1
select * from viewgettestsuitesdetailed order by local_start_time desc
select * from viewgettestsuitesdetailed order by $orderBy$ desc LIMIT $topN$
select * from viewgettestsuitesdetailed WHERE test_status NOT LIKE 'Running' order by $orderBy$ desc LIMIT $topN$

select * from viewgettestsuitesdetailed WHERE test_status NOT LIKE 'Running' AND local_start_time >= '$fromTime$' AND local_start_time <= '$toTime$' AND test_reference_id=$testReferenceId$ ORDER BY $orderBy$ ASC
select * from viewgettestsuitesdetailed WHERE test_status NOT LIKE 'Running' AND test_reference_id=$testReferenceId$ order by $orderBy$ desc LIMIT $topN$

SELECT * FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ON (test_reference_id) test_reference_id, id, test_suite_name, test_status, test_comments, test_build, local_start_time, local_end_time, remote_start_time, remote_end_time, test_host, test_reference, total_cases, passed_cases, failed_cases, skipped_cases, total_changes, passed_changes, failed_changes, skipped_changes, test_duration FROM viewgettestsuitesdetailed WHERE test_reference_id IN ($referenceIds$) AND test_status NOT LIKE 'Running' ORDER BY test_reference_id, local_start_time DESC) tmp_table ORDER BY local_start_time DESC
select * from viewgettestsuites where test_status NOT LIKE 'Running' AND aggregation_status=false order by local_start_time asc
select * from viewgettestsuites where test_status LIKE 'Running' order by local_start_time asc
select test_result, count(test_result) as test_count from re_test_case where test_suite_id=$id$ group by test_result
SELECT * FROM re_test_suite_aggregation where test_reference_id=$test_reference_id$ order by id desc LIMIT 1
sqlMap.insert: insert into re_test_suite (id, test_suite_name, test_build, test_status, test_comments, local_start_time, remote_start_time, test_reference_id, test_host) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE re_test_suite SET aggregation_status=true WHERE id=$id$
UPDATE re_test_suite SET test_status=?, test_build=?, test_comments=?, local_end_time=?, remote_end_time=? WHERE id=?
UPDATE re_test_suite SET test_suite_name=?, test_comments=? WHERE id=?
UPDATE re_test_suite SET test_status=? WHERE id=?
sqlMap.insert: insert into re_test_suite_aggregation (test_suite_id, total_cases, passed_cases, failed_cases, skipped_cases, total_changes, passed_changes, failed_changes, skipped_changes, test_reference_id, test_duration) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
insert into re_test_group (test_suite_id, test_group, test_comments, local_time, remote_time) values (?,?,?,?,?)
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM re_test_group WHERE test_suite_id=$testSuiteId$ AND test_group LIKE '$testGroup$' order by local_time desc
SELECT tg.id, tg.test_suite_id, tg.test_group, ts.test_suite_name, ts.test_build FROM re_test_group tg, re_test_suite ts where tg.id=$id$ and tg.test_suite_id=ts.id

select tg.test_suite_id, rt.test_group_id as id, tg.test_group, sum(rt.test_cases) as total_cases, sum(case when rt.test_result='Passed' then rt.test_cases else 0 end) as passed_cases, sum(case when rt.test_result='Failed' then rt.test_cases else 0 end) as failed_cases, sum(case when rt.test_result='Skipped' then rt.test_cases else 0 end) as skipped_cases from (select test_group_id, test_result, count(test_result) as test_cases from re_test_case where test_suite_id=$id$ group by test_group_id, test_result) rt, re_test_group tg where tg.id=rt.test_group_id group by rt.test_group_id, tg.test_group, tg.test_suite_id order by rt.test_group_id asc
sqlMap.insert: insert into re_test_case (test_suite_id, test_group_id, test_name, test_arguments, test_result, test_comments, test_files, test_gui_files, remote_start_time, local_start_time, remote_end_time, local_end_time) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE re_test_case SET test_result=?, test_comments=?, test_files=?, test_gui_files=?, remote_end_time=?, local_end_time=? WHERE id=?
UPDATE re_test_case SET test_result=? WHERE test_suite_id=? AND test_result=?
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM re_test_case WHERE test_suite_id=? AND test_group_id=? AND test_name LIKE ? AND local_start_time=? AND remote_start_time=?

SELECT tc.id, tc.test_name, tc.test_arguments, tc.test_result, tc.test_comments, tc.test_files, tc.test_gui_files, tc.local_start_time, tc.local_end_time, tc.remote_start_time, tc.remote_end_time, COALESCE(((EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM tc.local_end_time)*1000) - EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM tc.local_start_time)*1000),0) as test_duration, tg.test_group, ts.test_suite_name, ts.test_build from re_test_case tc, re_test_group tg, re_test_suite ts where tc.id=$id$ AND tc.test_group_id=tg.id AND tc.test_suite_id=ts.id
SELECT * FROM re_test_case WHERE test_suite_id=$testSuiteId$ AND test_group_id=$testGroupId$ order by local_start_time desc
SELECT * FROM re_test_case WHERE test_suite_id=$testSuiteId$ order by id desc LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM re_test_case WHERE test_gui_files IS NOT NULL AND test_suite_id=$id$ order by local_start_time desc
SELECT * FROM re_view_gettestcasedetailreport WHERE test_suite_id=$testSuiteId$ AND test_group_id=$testGroupId$ order by local_start_time asc
SELECT * FROM re_view_gettestcasedetailreport WHERE test_suite_id=$testSuiteId$ order by local_start_time asc
SELECT * FROM re_view_gettestcasedetailreport WHERE test_suite_id=$testSuiteId$ AND test_result='$testResult$' order by local_start_time asc
SELECT * FROM re_view_gettestcasedetailreport WHERE test_group_id=$testGroupId$ order by local_start_time asc
SELECT * FROM re_view_gettestcasedetailreport WHERE test_group_id=$testGroupId$ AND test_result='$testResult$' order by local_start_time asc
sqlMap.insert: insert into re_test_logs (test_suite_id, test_group_id, test_case_id, sequence_number, log_level, log_time, local_time, class_name, method_name, message, throwable) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM re_test_logs WHERE test_suite_id=$id$ ORDER BY log_time ASC
SELECT * FROM re_test_logs WHERE test_group_id=$id$ ORDER BY log_time ASC
SELECT * FROM re_test_logs WHERE test_case_id=$id$ ORDER BY log_time ASC
SELECT * FROM re_test_logs WHERE test_suite_id=$testSuiteId$ AND id>$id$ ORDER BY log_time ASC
SELECT * FROM re_test_logs WHERE test_group_id=$testGroupId$ AND id>$id$ ORDER BY log_time ASC
SELECT * FROM re_test_logs WHERE test_case_id=$testCaseId$ AND id>$id$ ORDER BY log_time ASC
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM re_test_suite WHERE id IN ($ids$)
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO re_test_reference (id, test_reference, creation_time) values (?,?,?)
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM re_test_reference ORDER BY test_reference ASC
SELECT * FROM re_test_reference ORDER BY test_reference LIKE '%$searchFilter$%' ASC
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO re_file_storage (test_case_id, file_name, file_byte, creation_time, screen_shot) values (?,?,?,?,?)
sqlMap.select: SELECT id, test_case_id, creation_time, file_name, screen_shot FROM re_file_storage WHERE test_case_id=$test_case_id$
SELECT id, test_case_id, creation_time, file_name, screen_shot FROM re_file_storage WHERE test_case_id=$test_case_id$ AND screen_shot=true
select id, test_gui_files from re_test_case where test_gui_files is not null order by id desc
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO re_report_group (group_name, email_to, email_cc, creation_time, test_suite_group_enabled, id) values (?,?,?,?,?,?)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE re_report_group SET group_name=?, email_to=?, email_cc=?, creation_time=?, test_suite_group_enabled=? WHERE id=?
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM re_report_group ORDER BY group_name ASC
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO re_report_group_reference (report_group_id, test_reference_id) values (?,?)
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM re_report_group_reference ORDER BY report_group_id ASC
select id from nextval('re_job_scheduler_id_seq') as id
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO re_job_scheduler (job_enabled, system_job, cron_expression, job_name, target_class_id, data_reference_id, simple_job, repeat_interval, repeat_count, valid_from_time, valid_to_time, job_frequency, job_weekday, job_day_month, job_execution_time, job_description, creation_time, last_edit_time) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE re_job_scheduler SET job_enabled=true WHERE id=$jobId$
UPDATE re_job_scheduler SET job_enabled=false WHERE id=$jobId$
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM viewgetjobschedulerall WHERE id IN(SELECT job_id FROM re_server_job WHERE server_id=$serverId$)
SELECT * FROM viewgetjobschedulerall WHERE target_class LIKE '$target_class$%'
SELECT * FROM viewgetjobschedulerall WHERE target_class LIKE '$targetClass$%' AND data_reference_id=$dataReferenceId$
SELECT * FROM viewgetjobschedulerall WHERE class_type='$classType$' AND data_reference_id=$dataReferenceId$
SELECT * FROM viewgetjobschedulerall WHERE target_class_id=$targetClassId$ AND data_reference_id=$dataReferenceId$
SELECT * FROM re_job_classes WHERE target_class LIKE '$target_class$%'
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO re_settings (key_value, key) values (?,?)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE re_settings SET key_value=? WHERE key=?

sqlMap.update: UPDATE re_auth_user SET enabled=$enabled$, ldap_id=$ldapId$, user_name='$userName$', first_name='$firstName$', last_name='$lastName$', email='$email$', last_edit_time='$lastEditTime$' WHERE id=$id$

sqlMap.update: UPDATE re_auth_user_password SET password=?, password_salt=? WHERE userid=?

sqlMap.update: UPDATE re_auth_ldap SET enabled=$enabled$, name='$name$', url='$url$', basedn='$baseDn$' WHERE id=$id$
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO re_auth_role (name, description) values (?,?)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE re_auth_role SET name='$name$', description='$description$' WHERE id=$id$
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO re_auth_permission (name, description) values (?,?)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE re_auth_permission SET name='$name$', description='$description$' WHERE id=$id$

INSERT INTO re_auth_role_permission_map (userid, roleid) values (?,?)

CREATE SEQUENCE re_resource_cpu_id_seq_$sub_name$ INCREMENT 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 9223372036854775807 START 1 CACHE 1;

CREATE TABLE re_resource_cpu_$sub_name$ ( id integer NOT NULL default nextval('re_resource_cpu_id_seq_$sub_name$'), local_time timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT statement_timestamp(), remote_time timestamp NOT NULL, "user" real NULL, sys real NULL, nice real NULL, idle real NULL, wait real NULL, irq real NULL, softIrq real NULL, stolen real NULL, combined real NULL, unique(id) );
CREATE SEQUENCE re_resource_cpus_id_seq_$sub_name$ INCREMENT 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 9223372036854775807 START 1 CACHE 1;

CREATE TABLE re_resource_cpus_$sub_name$ ( id integer NOT NULL default nextval('re_resource_cpus_id_seq_$sub_name$'), local_time timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT statement_timestamp(), remote_time timestamp NOT NULL, "user" real[] NULL, sys real[] NULL, nice real[] NULL, idle real[] NULL, wait real[] NULL, irq real[] NULL, softIrq real[] NULL, stolen real[] NULL, combined real[] NULL, unique(id) );
INSERT INTO re_resource_cpu_$tableSubName$ (remote_time, "user", sys, nice, idle, wait, irq, softIrq, stolen, combined) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM re_resource_cpu_$tableSubName$ ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM re_resource_cpu_$tableSubName$ WHERE local_time >='$fromTime$' AND local_time <='$toTime$' ORDER BY id ASC
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO re_resource_cpus_$tableSubName$ (remote_time, "user", sys, nice, idle, wait, irq, softIrq, stolen, combined) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM re_resource_cpu_$tableSubName$ ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM re_resource_cpus_$tableSubName$ WHERE local_time >='$fromTime$' AND local_time <='$toTime$' ORDER BY id ASC
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO re_server (name, host_ip, agent_port, update_interval) values (?,?,?,?)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE re_server SET name=?, host_ip=?, agent_port=?, update_interval=?, platform=? WHERE id=?
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM re_view_getserverdetailwithstatus ORDER BY id ASC

sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM re_server_job ORDER BY server_id ASC
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO re_server_status (server_id, reachable, agent_status) values (?,?,?)
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM re_server_status WHERE server_id=? AND local_time >= ? AND local_time <= ? ORDER BY id ASC
sqlMap.insert: CREATE SEQUENCE re_resource_memory_id_seq_$tableSubName$ INCREMENT 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 9223372036854775807 START 1 CACHE 1;

CREATE TABLE re_resource_memory_$tableSubName$ ( id integer NOT NULL default nextval('re_resource_memory_id_seq_$tableSubName$'), local_time timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT statement_timestamp(), remote_time timestamp NOT NULL, total bigint NOT NULL, used bigint NOT NULL, actual_used bigint NOT NULL, swap_total bigint NOT NULL, swap_used bigint NOT NULL, swap_page_in bigint NOT NULL, swap_page_out bigint NOT NULL, unique(id) );
INSERT INTO re_resource_memory_$tableSubName$ (remote_time, total, used, actual_used, swap_total, swap_used, swap_page_in, swap_page_out) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM re_resource_memory_$tableSubName$ ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM re_resource_memory_$tableSubName$ WHERE local_time >='$fromTime$' AND local_time <='$toTime$' ORDER BY id ASC
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO re_server_cpu_detail (remote_time, server_id, cache_size, cores_per_socket, mhz, model, total_cores, total_sockets, vendor) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE re_server_cpu_detail SET local_time=statement_timestamp(), remote_time=?, server_id=?, cache_size=?, cores_per_socket=?, mhz=?, model=?, total_cores=?, total_sockets=?, vendor=? WHERE server_id=$serverId$
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO re_server_network_detail (remote_time, server_id, hostname, default_gateway, primary_dns, secondary_dns, domain_name, iface_name, iface_description, iface_type, ip_address, subnetmask, broadcast, destination, mac, flags, metric, mtu) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE re_server_network_detail SET local_time=statement_timestamp(), remote_time=?, server_id=?, hostname=?, default_gateway=?, primary_dns=?, secondary_dns=?, domain_name=?, iface_name=?, iface_description=?, iface_type=?, ip_address=?, subnetmask=?, broadcast=?, destination=?, mac=?, flags=?, metric=?, mtu=? WHERE server_id=$serverId$
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO re_server_os_detail (remote_time, server_id, name, description, arch, machine, kernel_version, patch_level, vendor, vendor_version, vendor_code_name, data_model, cpu_endian, vendor_name) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE re_server_os_detail SET local_time=statement_timestamp(), remote_time=?, server_id=?, name=?, description=?, arch=?, machine=?, kernel_version=?, patch_level=?, vendor=?, vendor_version=?, vendor_code_name=?, data_model=?, cpu_endian=?, vendor_name=? WHERE server_id=$serverId$
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO re_server_memory_detail (remote_time, server_id, physical, swap) values (?,?,?,?)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE re_server_memory_detail SET local_time=statement_timestamp(), remote_time=?, server_id=?, physical=?, swap=? WHERE server_id=$serverId$
sqlMap.delete: DROP SEQUENCE IF EXISTS re_resource_cpu_id_seq_$tableName$ CASCADE
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS re_resource_cpu_$tableName$ CASCADE
DROP SEQUENCE IF EXISTS re_resource_memory_id_seq_$tableName$ CASCADE
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS re_resource_memory_$tableName$ CASCADE
